outputs.output_descr:
The project focuses on:
1. Mapping of attainment of Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) in Petauke
2. Sensitizing the local communities on MDGs 
3. Strengthening the capacity of the communities in planning and implementation

The project focuses on:
1. Mapping of attainment of Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) in Petauke
2. Sensitizing the local communities on MDGs 
3. Strengthening the capacity of the communities in planning and implementation

project_descr: Accelerating Localized attainment of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) in Petauke District in rural Zambia. The project will provide support to Ministry of Community Development, Mother and Child Health (MCDMCH) focusing on capacity building.
